descriptionHtml:
I made a screenshot with this clothing but after looking at it again I realised how odd the clothing look compared to the rest. My bad I ended up liking to wear casual clothing while in town (crafting, talking, ...) so I tried to improve the texture a little bit.

Actually I never did any texture work before so they are surely not really impressive but I can at least look at the dress now. Maybe someone like it until better things are released.

Texture size was increased from 512 to 2048 (AlphaMap from 512 to 1024 - did a new one from skretch and merged it with the existing). Also I repainted some parts by hand - but remember I\'m not really used to it, so \"by hand\" may sounds better than it actually looks.

To install simply drop the textures folder into your skyrim/data folder.

Credits go to Bethesda for the original textures.
author: Aelryn

files.name: Extra Texture Modded Casual Outfit Alliance Shirt MaleShep Metal
